title: nothing
body: Nothing happens…

title: something
body:
Something happened!!
New sentence.

title: tv
body:
Turn on the TV?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: pc
body:
Work on the PC?
[[ answer: yes|nothing]]

title: window
body:
You look at the window.
The street filled with motion.
Unusual motion. Kids play.
The window looks back. 
You look further.
Further away.

title: book
body:
You open the book.
The book reminds you of a once lost age,
A time in which time was not a matter of time.
Time stagnant,
Time infinite,
Never-ending,
Still and perpetuous.

title: typewriter
body:
You start writing.
Writing takes you deep into self-reflection
Demons, frustrations, joy, excesses, etc. are expunged
Through messed up and garbled amateur writing,
And it feels good.

title: drawing
body:
You start drawing.
Can’t remember when you drew last time.
Twisted figures – lack of practice – emerge
Come alive.
Still drawn.

title: bed
body:
Sleep…
Everything seems so quiet, 
With the absence of blue light
And electric buzzes.

title: couch
body:
You rest on the couch.
Stare at the ceiling,
A blank white canvas.

title: plants
body:
You watch the stillness of the plant.
You know it is moving
But you cannot perceive its movement
But you try
As hard as you can
Knowing you’ll fail to see,
Finding yourself in the middle of a conundrum
Of your limitations to experience life.

title: meditate
body:
You start meditating.
Empty your mind.
Nothing 
Zip
Blip
Nada
Nope…

title: candles
body:
You light the candle.
You hate the smell of it.
You know it is not healthy.
Yet you light it anyway.
You can’t accept the darkness.
Accept the natural darkness.
It is natural to be in the dark.
You need to see.
You need light…
Even knowing it is not good for you.

title: photos
body:
You look at the photo.
You miss your darlings.
You cannot get in touch with them.
You worry about them.
You worry.
If you ever loved, 
You worry.
Maybe more than you love.
You worry.
Maybe love is worry
To miss
To be missed
To worry
To want to be there.
To love.

title: fridge
body:
You open the fridge.
Food will perish.
One never knows when expiration dates are anticipated.
Ahead of time.

title: apple
body:
You bite the apple.
More often
You should taste it’s mundane flavor
refreshing, hard, red, crunchy
Mundane 
More often mundane,
Earthly
Mundane.

title: water
body:
You drink a full cup of water
Water sold as better water than other water
And other bottled water, as well
Water enveloped in plastic
For months
Transported in plastic
Heated by the sun
Weird blob shaped plastic with water inside
heated by the sun.

title: cookies
body:
You eat cookies
Efficient in filling the gaps of lost pleasures
A denial of loss you don’t want to deal with
Maybe not to many
Maybe not for long
Just long enough
Maybe just innocent pleasure

title: game console
body:
Play a videogame?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: stove
body:
Cook something?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: phone
body:
Call your beloved ones?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: washing
body:
Wash some clothes?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: water
body:
Wash?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: lights
body:
Turn on the lights?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: stereo
body:
Listen to some music?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: clock
body:
What a time!
What time…
time
t i m e
t  i  m  e
t   i   m   e
t    i    m    e
finite and never-ending…

title: microwave
body:
Warm some food in the microwave?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: heater
body:
Turn the heater on?
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: leave
body:
You never bothered to learn how to manually bypass the electronic lock…
[[answer:yes|nothing]]

title: newspaper
body:
You start reading the newspaper.
Horrible, disgusting, everywhere.
You put it down…

title: burger
body:
You start eating yesterday's burger.
Not that good…
Not that bad…
Just not…

title: intro
body:
28th of April 2025, late morning
All electrical power is offline everywhere
While nothing happens
Something else happens,
Seek what happens
Or…

<< set $isLastLine to true>>

title: end
body:
Lights are back on…
Business as usual
Life as usual
Back to the start


<< set $isPlayAgain to true>>
